trans-unit.source: Defines methods that a type implements to serialize and deserialize an object graph.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter> interface defines methods that a type can implement to serialize and deserialize the state that an ASP.NET Web server control maintains in its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property.
This infrastructure is used by classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class to maintain an ASP.NET page's state between requests.

By default, ASP.NET page state is serialized and deserialized by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter> class; however, site and adapter developers can implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter> interface on their own types to perform this work.

For more information about Web server control state management and view state, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce) and [Dynamic Web Server Controls and View State](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c1ea6a66-3307-4c98-8187-cad462e1c027).
Deserializes an object state graph from its serialized string form.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A> method to reconstitute the state object for an ASP.NET page or server control that has been serialized using the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter.Serialize%2A> method.
A string that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter"></xref> deserializes into an initialized object.
An object that represents the state of an ASP.NET server control.
Serializes ASP.NET Web server control state to string form.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter.Serialize%2A> method to transform an object state graph to string form.
Reconstitute a state object from the string using the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A> method.
The object that represents the view state of the Web server control to serialize to string form.
A string that represents a Web server control's view state.
